description: This automation basically helps in SAMS part it will, take input the SAMS excel file, and will calculate the column values , columns are J,K,L , they have their each seperate formula, and we are converting the excel data into data table and returning the datatable as output, there can be multiple combination of werse code , combination of multiple werse codes are seperated by comma ' , ' .
functions_details: There is only one C# Script/Function used, the function name is getCount, it basically do all the necessary calculations, counts the count of given code and returns a data table as output
comments:
If the output of any code count is 0, then it will show as "NA-SAMS" in output.
The output is displayed as Data Table.
